rooms.description: A welcoming space with open design to accommodate family and guests.
Spacious area designed for gatherings with large windows promoting natural light as per Vastu principles.
Adjacent to the living room, offering a semi-open dining space integrated into the entertainment zone.
Modern kitchen with an island counter designed for communal cooking activities.
Utility room including storage and small workspace for daily chores.
A quiet corner with ample natural light and bookshelves integrated into the design to encourage learning and relaxation.
